sentences.sContent: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.sCn: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

phrases.pCn: adj. 与……和谐相处；与……相配的

remMethod.val: com(一起) + pat(=path感情) + ible → 有共同感情的 → 相容的

words.tran: 适合地；协调地；相互兼容地

trans.tranCn: 能和谐共处的， 相容的
trans.tranOther: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies
